member.name: M:MelodicAlbuild.Version.Comparitors.Equal.IsEqual(MelodicAlbuild.Version.Version,MelodicAlbuild.Version.Version)
member.summary: Compares this Version to another Version and Determines if it is equal to the Compared Version.
member.returns: Returns True if Both Versions are Equal.

member.name: M:MelodicAlbuild.Version.Comparitors.IsGreater.IsGreaterThan(MelodicAlbuild.Version.Version,MelodicAlbuild.Version.Version)
member.summary: Compares this Version to another Version and Determines if it is Greater than the Compared Version.
member.returns: Returns True if This Version is Greater than the Compared Version.

member.name: M:MelodicAlbuild.Version.Comparitors.IsLess.IsLessThan(MelodicAlbuild.Version.Version,MelodicAlbuild.Version.Version)
member.summary: Compares this Version to another Version and Determines if it is Less than the Compared Version.
member.returns: Returns True if This Version is Less than the Compared Version.

member.name: T:MelodicAlbuild.Version.ExtensionTypes.VersionArray
member.summary: A Mediator Conversion from String Array to Version Array.

member.name: P:MelodicAlbuild.Version.ExtensionTypes.VersionArray.versions
member.summary: A Version Array from Compiled Strings.

member.name: M:MelodicAlbuild.Version.ExtensionTypes.VersionArray.#ctor(System.String[])
member.summary:
Creates a Default Version based off of the provided String Array.
STRINGS MUST BE IN FORMAT (Major.Minor.Patch)

member.name: M:MelodicAlbuild.Version.Version.#ctor(System.Int32)

Creates a Default Version with 1 Variable.
Other Numbers Default to 0.
